contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 30, 2018 D SCABA Autumn Contest (A Section)
SCABA Autumn Contest (A Section) 0 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Autumn Contest scaba-autumn-contest-a-section
Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Combined section for Championship, 1st and 2nd Section bands.
Best Hymn Tune: Friary Best Conductor: Chris King, Friary Best Instrumentalist: Martin Britt (soprano), Friary
Best Cornet or Flugel: Richard Straker (cornet), Friary Best Tenor Horn: Chris Pannell, Friary Best Baritone: Alex Sears, Friary Best Euphonium: Chris Straker, Friary Best Back Row Cornets: Friary Best Trombones: Friary Best Basses: Friary Best Percussion: Friary
Highest placed 2nd Section band: Soham Comrades Highest placed 1st Section band: Bedford Town Highest placed Championship Section band: Friary
Highest placed scaba member band (2nd Section): LGB Brass
Sept. 9, 2018, 2:29 p.m. Oct. 1, 2018, 3:25 p.m.
1 Friary Brass Band Chris King Handel in the Band
2 Aveley and Newham Band Alan Duguid An Epic Symphony
3 Bedford Town Band Andrew Kershaw Spectrum [Vinter]
4 Michelmersh Silver Band Melvin White The Raid
5 Alder Valley Brass Lee Woodward Purcell Variations [Downie]
6 Soham Comrades Band Mark Ager The Saga of Haakon the Good
7 LGB Brass Ian Stewart Triumphant Rhapsody
8 Epsom & Ewell Silver Band Paul Graham Kingdom of Dragons
9 East of England Co-op Band Nigel Cooper Of Distant Memories
10 BAE Systems Dave Chapman Kingdom of Dragons
11 Poole Borough Band Lloyd Bartlett Purcell Variations [Downie]
12 Horsham Borough Mark McLauchlin Rhapsody in Brass
Withdrawn Medway Band Nicholas Garman
